verses.verse: שְׁמֹ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> Keep [רַגְלֶיךָ כ] (רַגְלְךָ֗ <S%H7272><s%> be able to endure ק) כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> you תֵּלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וְקָר֣וֹב <S%H7138><s%> and be more ready לִשְׁמֹ֔עַ <S%H8085><s%> to hear מִתֵּ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> than to give הַכְּסִילִ֖ים <S%H3684><s%> of fools זָ֑בַח <S%H2077><s%> the sacrifice כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵינָ֥ם <S%H369><s%> for יוֹדְעִ֖ים <S%H3045><s%> for they consider לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> not that they do רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> evil

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> be not תְּבַהֵ֨ל <S%H926><s%> Be not rash עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פִּ֜יךָ <S%H6310><s%> with thy mouth וְלִבְּךָ֧ <S%H3820><s%> and let not thine heart אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not יְמַהֵ֛ר <S%H4116><s%> be hasty לְהוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> to utter דָבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> [any] thing לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For הָאֱלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> for God בַּשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> [is] in heaven וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are on הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and thou upon earth עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> let דְבָרֶ֖יךָ <S%H1697><s%> therefore let thy words מְעַטִּֽים׃ <S%H4592><s%> be few

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> cometh הַחֲל֖וֹם <S%H2472><s%> For a dream בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> through the multitude עִנְיָ֑ן <S%H6045><s%> of business וְק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice כְּסִ֖יל <S%H3684><s%> and a fool's בְּרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> [is known] by multitude דְּבָרִֽים׃ <S%H1697><s%> of words

כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> what תִּדֹּ֨ר <S%H5087><s%> When thou vowest נֶ֜דֶר <S%H5088><s%> a vow לֵֽאלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> unto God אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּאַחֵר֙ <S%H309><s%> defer לְשַׁלְּמ֔וֹ <S%H7999><s%> not to pay כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no חֵ֖פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> it for [he hath] no pleasure בַּכְּסִילִ֑ים <S%H3684><s%> in fools אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what תִּדֹּ֖ר <S%H5087><s%> that which thou hast vowed שַׁלֵּֽם׃ <S%H7999><s%> pay

ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Better אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> you should not תִדֹּ֑ר <S%H5087><s%> [is it] that thou shouldest not vow מִשֶּׁתִּדּ֖וֹר <S%H5087><s%> than that thou shouldest vow וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not תְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <S%H7999><s%> and not pay

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> Suffer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6310><s%> not thy mouth לַחֲטִ֣יא <S%H2398><s%> to sin אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׂרֶ֔ךָ <S%H1320><s%> to cause thy flesh וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֹּאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> neither say לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> thou before הַמַּלְאָ֔ךְ <S%H4397><s%> the angel כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that it was שְׁגָגָ֖ה <S%H7684><s%> that it [was] an error הִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> he לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why יִקְצֹ֤ף <S%H7107><s%> be angry הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> wherefore should God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> account קוֹלֶ֔ךָ <S%H6963><s%> at thy voice וְחִבֵּ֖ל <S%H2254><s%> and destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יָדֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> able

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Rather בְרֹ֤ב <S%H7230><s%> For in the multitude חֲלֹמוֹת֙ <S%H2472><s%> of dreams וַהֲבָלִ֔ים <S%H1892><s%> [there are] also [divers] vanities וּדְבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> words הַרְבֵּ֑ה <S%H7235><s%> and many כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Rather אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> thou God יְרָֽא׃ <S%H3372><s%> but fear

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If עֹ֣שֶׁק <S%H6233><s%> the oppression רָ֠שׁ <S%H7326><s%> of the poor וְגֵ֨זֶל <S%H1499><s%> and violent מִשְׁפָּ֤ט <S%H4941><s%> perverting of judgment וָצֶ֙דֶק֙ <S%H6664><s%> and justice תִּרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> If thou seest בַמְּדִינָ֔ה <S%H4082><s%> in a province אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתְמַ֖הּ <S%H8539><s%> marvel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> than they הַחֵ֑פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> not at the matter כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> one גָבֹ֜הַּ <S%H1364><s%> for [he that is] higher מֵעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> over גָּבֹ֙הַּ֙ <S%H1364><s%> than the highest שֹׁמֵ֔ר <S%H8104><s%> regardeth וּגְבֹהִ֖ים <S%H1364><s%> and [there be] higher עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> over

וְיִתְר֥וֹן <S%H3504><s%> Moreover the profit אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth בַּכֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all [הִיא כ] (ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he ק) מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> is for all the king לְשָׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> by the field נֶעֱבָֽד׃ <S%H5647><s%> [himself] is served

אֹהֵ֥ב <S%H157><s%> He that loveth כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> silver לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִשְׂבַּ֣ע <S%H7646><s%> shall not be satisfied כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> with silver וּמִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> who אֹהֵ֥ב <S%H157><s%> nor he that loveth בֶּהָמ֖וֹן <S%H1995><s%> abundance לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תְבוּאָ֑ה <S%H8393><s%> with increase גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> too זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> This הָֽבֶל׃ <S%H1892><s%> this [is] also vanity

בִּרְבוֹת֙ <S%H7235><s%> increase הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> When goods רַבּ֖וּ <S%H7235><s%> increase אוֹכְלֶ֑יהָ <S%H398><s%> that eat וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what כִּשְׁרוֹן֙ <S%H3788><s%> them and what good לִבְעָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H1167><s%> [is there] to the owners כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> thereof אִם־ <S%H518><s%> thereof saving [רְאִיַּת כ] (רְא֥וּת <S%H7200><s%> advise self ק) עֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> affliction

מְתוּקָה֙ <S%H4966><s%> [is] sweet שְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8142><s%> The sleep הָעֹבֵ֔ד <S%H5647><s%> of a labouring man אִם־ <S%H518><s%> whether מְעַ֥ט <S%H4592><s%> little וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> whether הַרְבֵּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> or much יֹאכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> whether he eat וְהַשָּׂבָע֙ <S%H7647><s%> but the abundance לֶֽעָשִׁ֔יר <S%H6223><s%> of the rich אֵינֶ֛נּוּ <S%H369><s%> will not מַנִּ֥יחַֽ <S%H3240><s%> will not suffer ל֖וֹ לִישֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H3462><s%> him to sleep

יֵ֚שׁ <S%H3426><s%> There is רָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> evil חוֹלָ֔ה <S%H2470><s%> a sore רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> [which] I have seen תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun עֹ֛שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> [namely] riches שָׁמ֥וּר <S%H8104><s%> kept לִבְעָלָ֖יו <S%H1167><s%> for the owners לְרָעָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H7451><s%> thereof to their hurt

וְאָבַ֛ד <S%H6><s%> perish הָעֹ֥שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> But those riches הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> those בְּעִנְיַ֣ן <S%H6045><s%> travail רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> by evil וְהוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> and he begetteth בֵּ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there בְּיָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand מְאֽוּמָה׃ <S%H3972><s%> and [there is] nothing

כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> he יָצָא֙ <S%H3318><s%> As he came forth מִבֶּ֣טֶן <S%H990><s%> womb אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> of his mother's עָר֛וֹם <S%H6174><s%> naked יָשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> shall he return לָלֶ֖כֶת <S%H1980><s%> carry כְּשֶׁבָּ֑א <S%H935><s%> as he came וּמְא֙וּמָה֙ <S%H3972><s%> nothing לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> and shall take בַעֲמָל֔וֹ <S%H5999><s%> of his labour שֶׁיֹּלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> carry בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also זֹה֙ <S%H2090><s%> And this רָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> evil חוֹלָ֔ה <S%H2470><s%> also [is] a sore כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֻמַּ֥ת <S%H5980><s%> [that] in all points שֶׁבָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> as he came כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> thus יֵלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> die וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יִּתְר֣וֹן <S%H3504><s%> and what profit ל֔וֹ שֶֽׁיַּעֲמֹ֖ל <S%H5998><s%> hath he that hath laboured לָרֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> air

גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> also כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Throughout יָמָ֖יו <S%H3117><s%> All his days בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> in darkness יֹאכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> also he eateth וְכָעַ֥ס <S%H3708><s%> vexation הַרְבֵּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> and [he hath] much וְחָלְי֥וֹ <S%H2483><s%> with his sickness וָקָֽצֶף׃ <S%H7110><s%> and wrath

הִנֵּ֞ה <S%H2009><s%> Here אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> is what רָאִ֣יתִי <S%H7200><s%> Behold [that] which I have seen אָ֗נִי <S%H589><s%> I ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [it is] good אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יָפֶ֣ה <S%H3303><s%> and comely לֶֽאֶכוֹל־ <S%H398><s%> [for one] to eat וְ֠לִשְׁתּוֹת <S%H8354><s%> and to drink וְלִרְא֨וֹת <S%H7200><s%> and to enjoy טוֹבָ֜ה <S%H2896><s%> the good בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲמָל֣וֹ ׀ <S%H5999><s%> of all his labour שֶׁיַּעֲמֹ֣ל <S%H5998><s%> that he taketh תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> under הַשֶּׁ֗מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun מִסְפַּ֧ר <S%H4557><s%> all יְמֵי־ <S%H3117><s%> the days [חַיָּו כ] (חַיָּ֛יו <S%H2416><s%> age ק) אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> giveth ל֥וֹ הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> which God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> this חֶלְקֽוֹ׃ <S%H2506><s%> him for it [is] his portion

גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> Furthermore כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הָאָדָ֡ם <S%H120><s%> Every man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> to whom נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> hath given ל֣וֹ הָאֱלֹהִים֩ <S%H430><s%> also to whom God עֹ֨שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> riches וּנְכָסִ֜ים <S%H5233><s%> and wealth וְהִשְׁלִיט֨וֹ <S%H7980><s%> and hath given him power לֶאֱכֹ֤ל <S%H398><s%> to eat מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> and to וְלָשֵׂ֣את <S%H5375><s%> thereof and to take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶלְק֔וֹ <S%H2506><s%> his portion וְלִשְׂמֹ֖חַ <S%H8055><s%> and to rejoice בַּעֲמָל֑וֹ <S%H5999><s%> in his labour זֹ֕ה <S%H2090><s%> this מַתַּ֥ת <S%H4991><s%> [is] the gift אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God הִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> he will not הַרְבֵּ֔ה <S%H7235><s%> For he shall not much יִזְכֹּ֖ר <S%H2142><s%> remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> the days חַיָּ֑יו <S%H2416><s%> of his life כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> because הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> because God מַעֲנֶ֖ה <S%H6031><s%> answereth בְּשִׂמְחַ֥ת <S%H8057><s%> [him] in the joy לִבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3820><s%> of his heart
